// Base HP/SP Tables
// Supports up to base level 500.
//
// Structure of Database:
// StartLevel,EndLevel,JobID,Type,Base value for Lv 1,2,...,Base value for 'Max level'
//
// Type:
//	0 = BaseHP, 1 = BaseSP

//===============================
// Base HP Table
// According to base HP calculation on http://irowiki.org/wiki/Max_HP
//===============================
